page.title: 15Local Interest Group
page.content: Formed in May 1982, West Haddon Local Interest Group brings together native villagers and newer arrivals who share an interest in the past life of the community. We maintain a large photographic archive, and are also building up a collection of audio tapes containing the recollections of a number of long esblished village residents. Other research is undertaken by individual members of the group, and material is indexed and stored for future use in the mounting of our annual exhibitions. This years exhibition on the theme Village Buildings was a relatively small affair, with a slide show illustrating changes in the recent past and a photographic display of older views.
